review_text: I and my family have had a blast with this ice cream maker! We have been making up some of our own recipes as well as using those supplied with the machine and some from Ben & Jerry's recipe book. The savings over store bought ice cream is phenomenal too. I only have one small exception to our "eye blasting red" ice cream maker (and it is indeed a small exception). It could be perhaps be a bit quieter... On the other hand, it is readily apparent by the change in the "noise" the machine makes, that your delectable treat is ready to decant!GET IT, MAKE IT, LOVE IT...  then do it again!
summary: It doesn't get much better than this!
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
